entry.title: WIND WARNING , Oakville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:41 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers early this afternoon. Clearing this afternoon. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 90. Temperature steady near 14. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness late this evening. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain. High plus 5.
